title: Gamification-Based Project Design for Solving Mathematical Problems in Vocational Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Core secondary mathematics concepts and workplace-based practical experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based gamification tools, focusing on team-based project execution and field-applicable mathematical problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through a gamified project design process.
In team collaboration projects, learners solve and present work-related mathematical problems at least three times using game mechanics (challenges, feedback systems).
Post-training survey results show a 20% or greater increase in learning motivation scores compared to pre-training levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
